att.name: retryAttempts
att.description: (default = 5) In case of failures during the communication to the vRA Repository, the communication will be reattempted this many times

att.name: intervalBetweenRetriesInSeconds
att.description: (default = 5) Number of seconds between each attempt if there are failures

att.name: argumentOutputArraySize
att.description: (default = 1000) Chunk array results into multiple argument records of this size
